'''''Shadows of the Colossi''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Vagrant Secret Source Dragon Idol is located on an island in the far southwest corner of [[Atocpan]]. It is easily accessed by completing another puzzle (see [[#Video Guides|Video Guide]]).
